thread.title: French strikes continue as standoff with Macron deepens

title: French strikes continue as standoff with Macron deepens
text:
French strikes continue as standoff with Macron deepens 8:00pm IST - 01:48 
French railway workers resume rolling strikes against President Macron's reform plans for the state-owned railway company SNCF, triggering widespread travel chaos. As Kate King reports, it comes as a defiant Macron insists he will stick to the planned overhaul.
